     Karnalyte Resources Inc. – Executive Change 
      KRN Admin  September 11, 2019     


 


   
 
 
                 September 11, 2019   —   Saskatoon, SK (CNW–September 11, 2019) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN)  announced today that effective immediately, Mr. Frank Wheatley, Chief Executive Officer and former President, is no longer with the Company. The Company’s Chief Financial Officer, Ms. Danielle Favreau, will act as Interim CEO. The Company will make an announcement on permanent plans to replace Mr. Wheatley as soon as such information is available.
 For further information, please contact: 
 Karnalyte Resources Inc. 
1 (306) 986-1486 
info@karnalyte.com 
www.karnalyte.com
